alert.note: Alert for Santa Cruz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 7:03PM MST until August 06 at 7:45PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM MST FOR EASTERN SANTA CRUZ COUNTY... At 703 PM MST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sonoita to Patagonia to just east of Nogales International Airport, moving west and northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Nogales, Patagonia, Sonoita, Elgin, Nogales International Airport, Patagonia Lake State Park and Kino Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
